text:
Hi Simon - I gave it careful consideration and here are my mentorship goals 
1. To put me in a position where I understand what the industry are looking for. In particular, how I would present myself, for example showreel, CV, website. 
This should start a chain reaction where I can start to put the building blocks into place to work towards gaining an internship and finally moving into the industry post-university. 

2. I also wanted to seek pathways into freelancing. 

3. For The Mill in particular I would like to find out about making applications/best approach/how to stand out - I did take a really big interest in The Mill from a young age, I love the atmosphere and the way they present themselves. 

What do you think??
